label: Job Fairs and Recruitment Events
description: Events and opportunities for job seekers and recruiters to connect and network.

subcategories.label: Local Job Fairs
subcategories.description: Job fairs held in specific geographic locations.

subcategories.label: Industry-Specific Job Fairs
subcategories.description: Job fairs focused on specific industries or career fields.

subcategories.label: International Recruitment
subcategories.description: Recruitment events and opportunities for international job seekers and employers.

subcategories.label: Teaching Recruitment
subcategories.description: Recruitment events and opportunities for teachers.

subcategories.label: Miscellaneous Job Fairs
subcategories.description: Job fairs that don't fit into other subcategories.
